changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE CUSTOMER_ORDER( ID SERIAL PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, ORDER_DATE TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, BOOK_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, CUSTOMER_ID BIGINT NOT NULL, NUM_OF_BOOKS BIGINT NOT NULL, ORDER_COST DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT FK_ORDER_BOOK_ID FOREIGN KEY (BOOK_ID) REFERENCES BOOK(ID), CONSTRAINT FK_ORDER_CUSTOMER_ID FOREIGN KEY (CUSTOMER_ID) REFERENCES CUSTOMER(ID) );
